subject: Re: Responsive issue fix
preview: Hi Samir,  Yes, we can confirm that 2 per row on load more products. Here is the screenshot. We have cleared the server and site cache.

full_threads.body:
Hi Samir,

Yes, we can confirm that 2 per row on load more products. Here is the screenshot. We have cleared the server and site cache.

Hi Joel,

Thank you for the update. Also, "Load More Related Products" needs to appear in a 2x2 format similar to Related Products, as mentioned in the email before.

Kind Regards,

Samir Bhatta IT Support | Bachelors of IT |

Proudly Supporting

Hi Samir,

Confirming we have updated the responsive related.
https://www.designtiles.com.au/product/chelsea-series-brick-60x250-mm-porcelain-tile/

Let us know if this works for you?
This ticket has been waiting for over 24 hours.

Hi Joel, could you please fix this responsive issue for now? Also, "Load More Related Products" needs to appear in a 2x2 format similar to Related Products.




Kind Regards,

Samir Bhatta IT Support | Bachelors of IT |

Hi Samir,

Sure, we can confirm that it is 42GB.

Hi Joel,

Could you please confirm this for me?
Based on the information from the WP Optimize plugin, the total size appears to be 55.12 GB. Can you please confirm if this refers to the live website? Also, you mentioned 42 GB-could you clarify what that figure represents?


Kind Regards,

Samir Bhatta IT Support | Bachelors of IT |

Proudly Supporting

Hi Samir,

I hope you're doing well.

Upon review, here’s a breakdown of what we need to check:
  • Ensure the theme is compatible with the latest version of WooCommerce.
  • Verify that the theme works seamlessly with the custom scripts created by the previous developer.
  • Confirm that the sample products are displaying and functioning correctly.
This process may take approximately 2–4 hours, provided no issues arise. If we do encounter any problems, we’ll notify you immediately and advise on the next steps.

Resources:
  • Server: 42GB
  • Backups: Daily backups are in place — everything is covered. 😊

Let us know if you have any questions or if there's anything else you’d like us to address.

Hi Joel,

Sorry, i didn't notice the last bit of the email. Could you please advise the approximate time required for this request?

I'd also like to check on our server storage usage. From my end, it looks like we're using approximately 55.12 GB-could you please confirm that?
Additionally, regarding backups, is the website being backed up daily? And do I still need to use Updraft Backup, or is everything already covered?

Kind Regards,

Samir Bhatta IT Support | Bachelors of IT |

Proudly Supporting

Hi Samir,

I hope you're doing well.

We will take a copy of the current live site and set it up on a staging environment. From there, we’ll update all necessary plugins and thoroughly test the site to ensure everything is functioning as expected.

Once everything is confirmed to be working correctly, we’ll share the staging link with you for review. After your approval, we’ll proceed with performing the updates on the live site.

Let me know if you have any questions in the meantime.

Hi Joel,

Hope this email finds you well.

Could you please fix this issue?

Also, I was wondering if we could update WooCommerce without impacting plugins. I remember you had advised not to update WooCommerce a long time ago.

Kind Regards,

Hi Samir,

We are looking into this. Upon checking, we are currently 35 minutes over for this month.
This task is estimated to take around 15 minutes.
Please let me know if you would like to proceed.

Hi Joel,
I hope this email finds you well.
Could you please help me fix the CSS? In the mobile view, the related products are displayed vertically. I'd like them to appear in a 2x2 grid instead. Also, could you please ensure that the font sizes are consistent and that the sale and regular prices appear on the same line? Currently, they are split across two lines.
When you get a chance, could you also check if there are any remaining hours for the month? If there are, could you please help me fix this?
Thank you so much for your help!



Kind Regards,

Samir Bhatta IT Support | Bachelors of IT |
